Posts.EditableText: I'm looking for a program I can edit sound with. I don't need anything special. Let me know if you have anything that fits this vauge description.
Posts.HTML: I'm looking for a program I can edit sound with. I don't need anything special. Let me know if you have anything that fits this vauge description.

Posts.EditableText:
*starts to sing*
COOL - EDIT - PROOOO
*other voice enters*
TWO-POINT-OOOOOOOO

... Yeah, I like cool edit pro 2.. I downloaded it (*cough*and crack*/cough*) and it was VERY good.
Has brill effects, can do multiple tracks, mix, midi stuff, etc. Probably alot more has been added - or maybe not. This was back in about 2001/2002.
I guess if you had Nero, you could use some of those tools that come with it.

You could also go for a search on sourceforge.net, see if anything comes up there.
